variant.name: User-creation.CreateChildAccount
variant.obsolete: This histogram was available before introducing software update sreen which requiered split the add child step into it is own screen this changes is implemented in M-117. Add-child.CreateChildAccount is replacing this one.

variant.name: User-creation.EnterpriseEnroll
variant.obsolete: This histogram was available before introducing software update sreen. This is replaced by `User-creation.EnterpriseEnrollTriage` and `User-creation.EnterpriseEnrollShortcut` starting from M-117.

variant.name: User-creation.SignInAsChild
variant.obsolete: This histogram was available before introducing software update sreen which requiered split the add child step into it is own screen this changes is implemented in M-117. Add-child.SignInAsChild histogram is replacing this one.

histogram.name: OOBE.ArcTermsOfServiceScreen.ReviewFollowingSetup
histogram.summary: Whether the review Google Play following setup box is checked. Recorded when user leaves ArcTermsOfService screeen.

histogram.name: OOBE.ArcTermsOfServiceScreen.UserActions
histogram.summary: Tracks all user actions on the ArcTermsOfService screen. Recorded when user clicks on buttons on the ArcTermsOfService screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.BootToOOBECompleted.{CompletedOobeFlowType}
histogram.summary: Time from boot until pre-login OOBE is completed. If the device was rebooted during OOBE, the time is calculated since the last boot.

histogram.name: OOBE.BootToSignInCompleted
histogram.summary:
Time from the login screen start to user session start.
Warning: this histogram was expired from 2022-04-03 to 2023-04-04; data may be missing.

histogram.name: OOBE.CHOOBE.FlowSkipped
histogram.summary: Whether the CHOOBE flow was skipped without selecting any screens. Recorded after the user completes the CHOOBE flow.

histogram.name: OOBE.CHOOBE.ScreenCompleted.{OOBEOptionalScreens}
histogram.summary:
Whether the {OOBEOptionalScreens} screen was selected and completed from the CHOOBE screen. Recorded after the user completes the CHOOBE flow. If the user visits the same screen multiple times, only a single event will be recorded.
The histogram is not recorded if the {OOBEOptionalScreens} screen was shown outside of the CHOOBE flow.

histogram.name: OOBE.CHOOBE.SettingChanged.{OOBEOptionalScreens}
histogram.summary:
Whether the setting in {OOBEOptionalScreens} screen was changed when the screen was visited. Recorded when the user clicks "next" or "return to CHOOBE" button. This metric is recorded regardless of whether the CHOOBE screen was shown.
The histogram is recorded once per visit to the screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.ChromeVersionBeforeUpdate
histogram.summary: Chrome major version recorded in OOBE before any updates are applied.

histogram.name: OOBE.ConsolidatedConsentScreen.RecoveryOptInResult
histogram.summary: Tracks the result of the cryptohome recovery opt-in on the consolidated consent screen. Recorded when user exists the consolidated consent screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.ConsolidatedConsentScreen.UserActions
histogram.summary: Tracks user actions on the consolidated consent screen. Recorded when user clicks on buttons on the consolidated consent screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.ConsumerUpdateScreen.IsMandatory
histogram.summary: Whether the consumer update was mandatory or optional. This is decided based on the estimate of time needed for the update to be applied. This is recorded when the skip button in the consumer update is decided to be shown or stay hidden.

histogram.name: OOBE.ConsumerUpdateScreen.IsOptionalUpdateSkipped
histogram.summary: Whether the optional consumer update was skipped. This is recorded when the skip button is clicked or when the update is completed. or stay hidden.

histogram.name: OOBE.ConsumerUpdateScreen.SkipReason
histogram.summary: The reason for skipping the update. These reasons do not include when the user skips the update screen but the update continues in the background.

histogram.name: OOBE.ConsumerUpdateScreen.UpdateTime.{ConsumerUpdateType}
histogram.summary: Time spent starting from the update screen is shown until the {ConsumerUpdateType} update is completed before rebooting the device.

histogram.name: OOBE.DrivePinning.Enabled
histogram.summary: Whether the user has enabled or disabled Drive Pinning. Recorded once with the final decision made by the user. The recording is done after onboarding is completed and before starting the drive pinning feature.

histogram.name: OOBE.Enrollment.IsUserEnrollingAConsumer
histogram.summary: Whether the enrollment screen is shown for a user that was already determined to be a consumer during the consumer update.

histogram.name: OOBE.ErrorScreensTime.{OOBEScreenShownBeforeNetworkError}.{OOBENetworkError}
histogram.summary: Time spent on error screens during {OOBEScreenShownBeforeNetworkError} when the last error is {OOBENetworkError} error. Recorded when the host screen is destroyed. Note: None error means that the ErrorScreen was finally hidden.

histogram.name: OOBE.FingerprintSetupScreen.UserActions
histogram.summary: Tracks all user actions on the fingerprint screen. Recorded when user clicks on buttons on the fingerprint screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.GaiaLoginTime
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time spent by user to complete GAIA login during first-run OOBE. Recorded after receiving authentication success signal. Not recorded for SAML flow.

histogram.name: OOBE.GaiaPasswordChangedScreen.UserActions
histogram.summary: Tracks all user actions on the GaiaPasswordChanged screen. Recorded when user clicks on buttons on the screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.GaiaScreen.LoginRequests
histogram.summary:
Tracks all user login requests differentiated by flows on the Gaia screen. Recorded when password is entered for authentication. Note: this is not recorded for SAML flows.
Warning: this histogram was expired from 2022-04-25 to 2022-08-18; data may be missing.

histogram.name: OOBE.GaiaScreen.PasswordIgnoredChars
histogram.summary: Records whether user password contains characters ignored by Gaia. The histogram is recorded after online login and not recorded for SAML users.

histogram.name: OOBE.GaiaScreen.SuccessLoginRequests
histogram.summary:
Tracks all successful user login requests differentiated by flows on the Gaia screen. Recorded when authentication is successful. Note: this is not recorded for SAML flows.
Warning: this histogram was expired from 2022-04-25 to 2022-08-18; data may be missing.

histogram.name: OOBE.GestureNavigationScreen.PageShownTime.{OOBEGestureNavigationPage}
histogram.summary:
Records the amount of time that each page within the gesture navigation OOBE screen is shown. Recorded when the gesture navigation oobe screen is exiting.
Warning: this histogram was expired from 2021-08-09 to 2023-04-04; data may be missing.

histogram.name: OOBE.HidDetectionScreen.BluetoothPairing.Duration.{PairingResult}
histogram.summary: Records how long it takes for a pairing attempt, initiated automatically during the OOBE HID detection screen, to finish. If the user needed to go through an auth process during pairing, the time the user took to confirm that is included.

histogram.name: OOBE.HidDetectionScreen.BluetoothPairing.Result
histogram.summary: Records if a HID pairing attempt (initiated automatically by the OOBE HID detection screen) paired successfully via Bluetooth or did not pair successfully via Bluetooth. This is expected to fail most of the time because of it being initiated in a loop automatically while the OOBE HID Detection screen is open.

histogram.name: OOBE.HidDetectionScreen.BluetoothPairing.TimeoutExceeded
histogram.summary: Records success each time a pairing session times out while on the OOBE HID detection page.

histogram.name: OOBE.HidDetectionScreen.BluetoothPairingAttempts
histogram.summary: Records the total number of pairing attempts with Bluetooth human interface devices (HID). This metric is emitted after the HID detection screen exits in OOBE. It does not include devices attempted to be paired with before or after the HID detection screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.HidDetectionScreen.HidConnected
histogram.summary: Records the type of a connected human interface device (HID). This metric is emitted each time a HID is connected during the HID detection screen in OOBE. It does not include devices connected before the screen is shown or after the screen is hidden.

histogram.name: OOBE.HidDetectionScreen.HidDisconnected
histogram.summary: Records the type of a connected human interface device (HID) that is disconnected. This metric is emitted each time a HID is disconnected during the HID detection screen in OOBE. It does not include devices disconnected before the screen is shown or after the screen is hidden.

histogram.name: OOBE.HidDetectionScreen.InitialHidsMissing
histogram.summary: Records the types of human interface devices (HIDs) that are not connected when OOBE starts. This metric is not emitted for Chrome OS devices that have the OOBE HID detection screen disabled.

histogram.name: OOBE.MarketingOptInScreen.BackendConnector.{OOBEMarketingCountry}
histogram.summary: The result of a request performed by the MarketingBackendConnector used in the OOBE MarketingOptInScreen when subscribing users in {OOBEMarketingCountry} to Chromebook emails. This data is used to determine the success rate of the requests being performed.

histogram.name: OOBE.MarketingOptInScreen.Event.{OOBEMarketingCountry}
histogram.summary: Records the choice users in {OOBEMarketingCountry} takes when prompted with a toggle on the OOBE MarketingOptInScreen to subscribe to Chromebook emails.

histogram.name: OOBE.MarketingOptInScreen.GeolocationResolve
histogram.summary: Records whether the user's geolocation was resolved successfully.

histogram.name: OOBE.NetworkErrorShown.{OOBEScreenShownBeforeNetworkError}
histogram.summary: Number of times error screen has appeared during {OOBEScreenShownBeforeNetworkError}

histogram.name: OOBE.OnboardingFlowDuration.{OnboardingType}
histogram.summary: Records the total time it took the user to complete the onboarding flow, starting from after the login of the new user (before the first onboarding screen is shown). and ending after the completion of the last onboarding screen (before the start of the session). The time recorded includes the time while the device is turned off.

histogram.name: OOBE.OnboardingFlowStatus.{OnboardingType}
histogram.summary: Records "Started" and "Completed" events for the entire onboarding flow of a new user. "Started" is recorded after a new user logs-in (before the first onboarding screen is shown). "Completed" is recorded after the completion of the last screen in the onboarding flow (before the start of the session).

histogram.name: OOBE.OobeFlowDuration
histogram.summary: Records the total time it took the user to complete OOBE, starting from the first start of OOBE (before the first OOBE screen is shown) and ending after the completion of the last onboarding screen for the first user (before the start of the first session). The time recorded includes the time while the device is turned off.

histogram.name: OOBE.OobeFlowStatus
histogram.summary: Records "Started" and "Completed" events for the entire OOBE flow. "Started" is recorded at the first start of OOBE before the first OOBE screen is shown. "Completed" is recorded after the completion of the last screen in the onboarding flow of the first user and before sign-in is completed.

histogram.name: OOBE.OobeStartToOnboardingStartTime
histogram.summary: Records the total time it took the user to complete OOBE, starting from the first start of OOBE (before the first OOBE screen is shown) and ending after the completion of the last onboarding screen for the first user (before the start of the first session). The time recorded includes the time while the device is turned off.

histogram.name: OOBE.PinSetupScreen.UserActions
histogram.summary: Tracks all user actions on the PinSetup screen. Recorded when user clicks on buttons on the PinSetup screen or when screen is automatically skipped.

histogram.name: OOBE.RecommendApps.Fetcher.DownloadTime
histogram.summary: The time it takes to fetch the recommended apps.

histogram.name: OOBE.RecommendApps.Fetcher.ResponseCode
histogram.summary: The response code of fetching the recommended apps.

histogram.name: OOBE.RecommendApps.Screen.Action
histogram.summary: The user action on the recommend apps screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.RecommendApps.Screen.SelectedAppCount
histogram.summary: The number of apps user selected.

histogram.name: OOBE.RecommendApps.Screen.SelectedRecommendedPercentage
histogram.summary: The ratio of selected and recommended apps.

histogram.name: OOBE.RecommendApps.Screen.State
histogram.summary: Whether the reocmmend apps screen is shown.

histogram.name: OOBE.StepCompletionTime.{OOBELegacyScreenName}
histogram.summary: Time spent on {OOBELegacyScreenName} OOBE screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.StepCompletionTime2.{CommonScreenName}.{OnboardingType}
histogram.summary: Time spent on {CommonScreenName} OOBE screen. Recorded only after exiting the screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.StepCompletionTime2.{OOBEOnlyScreenName}
histogram.summary: Time spent on {OOBEOnlyScreenName} OOBE screen. Recorded only after exiting the screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.StepCompletionTimeByExitReason.{OOBEScreenName_ExitReason}
histogram.summary: Time spent on specific OOBE screen grouped by exit reason.

histogram.name: OOBE.StepShownStatus.Multidevice-setup-screen.Skipped
histogram.summary: The reason why the Multidevice setup screen is skipped in OOBE. Recorded when determining that the screen should be skipped. This metric breaks down the "Not shown" bucket of "OOBE.StepShownStatus.Multidevice-setup-screen".

histogram.name: OOBE.StepShownStatus.{OOBELegacyScreenName}
histogram.summary: Whether {OOBELegacyScreenName} screen was shown or not. Recorded before showing screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.StepShownStatus2.{CommonScreenName}.{OnboardingType}
histogram.summary:
Whether {CommonScreenName} screen was shown or not. Recorded before showing screen.
The "Not Shown" bucket represents instances where the user reached the point where the screen is usually shown, but the pre-conditions for showing the screen was not met.

histogram.name: OOBE.StepShownStatus2.{OOBEOnlyScreenName}
histogram.summary:
Whether {OOBEOnlyScreenName} screen was shown or not. Recorded before showing screen.
The "Not Shown" bucket represents instances where the user reached the point where the screen is usually shown, but the pre-conditions for showing the screen was not met.

histogram.name: OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.Behavior
histogram.summary: Whether the sync consent screen was shown, skipped with sync disabled, or skipped with sync enabled. Recorded when the screen is closed. Metrics Sync.InitialState2 and OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.SyncEnabled provide more detail on the state of the sync engine.

histogram.name: OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.IsCapabilityKnown
histogram.summary: Indicates whether account capability information is fetched for user when SyncConsent screen is shown.

histogram.name: OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.IsMinorUser
histogram.summary: Indicates whether the current user is a minor user (impacted by AADC regulations). We cannot use nudge techniques on UI if the user is a minor user.

histogram.name: OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.LacrosSyncOptIns.DataType.{OsDataType}
histogram.summary: Records the selected data type to sync during the OS Sync consent screen in OOBE flow with Lacros enabled.

histogram.name: OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.LacrosSyncOptIns.SyncEverything
histogram.summary: Indicate if sync all os types is enabled for the sync consent OOBE when Lacros enabled.

histogram.name: OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.LoadingTime
histogram.summary: Records the amount of time while waiting for sync engine to be initialized, before the SyncConsent screen is shown.

histogram.name: OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.ReviewFollowingSetup
histogram.summary: Whether the review following setup box is checked. Recorded when user leaves SyncConsent screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.SyncEnabled
histogram.summary: Final state of the sync service at the end of the sync consent OOBE step. The dialog may have been shown or skipped (e.g. by enterprise policy). See OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.Behavior for skip reasons.

histogram.name: OOBE.SyncConsentScreen.UserChoice
histogram.summary: Which button the user clicked on the out-of-box sync consent screen. Recorded when the user clicks the button, which also closes the screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.ThemeSelectionScreen.SelectedTheme
histogram.summary: Theme selected from OOBE theme selection screen. Recorded after the next button is clicked.

histogram.name: OOBE.UpdateScreen.StageTime.{UpdateStage}
histogram.summary: Time spent on {UpdateStage} stage of the ChromeOS update. Recorded when the stage is done and the next is about to start.

histogram.name: OOBE.UpdateScreen.UpdateDownloadingTime
histogram.summary: Time spent on downloading ChromeOS update when critical updated is found during OOBE. Recorded when update is uploaded and ChromeOS device is about to restart to apply the update.

histogram.name: OOBE.WebUI.LoadTime.FirstRun
histogram.summary: Time required for ChromeOS to load the First Run WebUI (i.e. out-of-box experience). Recorded at most once per Chrome lifetime (if OOBE is shown).

histogram.name: OOBE.WebViewLoader.FirstLoadResult.{WebViewID}
histogram.summary: Records the first result of loading the webview {WebViewID} in OOBE flow. This metric is emitted every time a webview in OOBE is loaded using OOBE WebViewLoader. Only the first load result of each load is emitted, ignoring the re-load results.

histogram.name: OOBE.WelcomeScreen.A11yUserActions
histogram.summary: Measures usage of the accessibility options on the welcome screen during OOBE. Recorded when user enables or disables any of the accessibility options from accessibility menu on the welcome screen.

histogram.name: OOBE.WelcomeScreen.AcceptChromeVoxHint
histogram.summary: Whether or not the user accepted the ChromeVox hint. Recorded when the user interacts with the ChromeVox hint dialog.

histogram.name: OOBE.WelcomeScreen.ChromeVoxHintSpokenSuccess
histogram.summary:
Whether or not the ChromeVox hint was successfully spoken. Recorded when the ChromeVox hint dialog is shown.
Warning: this histogram was expired from 2022-04-25 to 2022-08-18 and from 2022-10-04 to 2023-04-04; data may be missing.

histogram.name: OOBE.WelcomeScreen.UserChangedLocale
histogram.summary: Whether or not the user changed the language on the Welcome Screen. Records when the user leaves the Welcome Screen if they have changed the locale in the UI.
